channel.title: Npc attack / die / defence help
channel.description:
Hello, i have this problem with my npcs then i attack them thay looks like shit, then i found out, how to fix then it attacks back, but then my npcs die its total bugged or then its block my attacking. the npc im working on is 116. i know the die, def, att ids i just need to find out how i add it.
Thanks
